title: Back with proof of hacking.

embed.description: Very quick video to give you a short case example of how much of and advantage a stat-padding player will receive. JUST COUNTING the discrepancy in how he takes and heals damage, there is 500+ health difference. If he was playing legit, he'd undoubtedly have lost the 1v1.

body:
Still around even 6 years after i told riot about this one.
Noc gains over a 500hp advantage due to stat padding.
